title: _act_
author: _act_
content: The latest update of google 2FA app will let your 2FA to synchronize to google cloud, I am telling bitcoin users that may not want that. I posted it on beginners and help but it was moved to off-topic where useless post is full of. This is the topic: Google authenticator synchronizing with google online cloudDoes this kind of topic belongs to off-topic?

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Simply because it's off topic. It doesn't discuss anything about bitcoin topics or even mentioning that it should be for bitcoin users or so.

comments.author: Apocollapse
comments.body: Bitcoin has nothing to with google authenticator, someone can own a Bitcoin without need to use google authenticator.But such topic is a part of cybersecurity and there's a thread demand for theymos to create a new section for discussing such topic Request: "Cybersecurity and Privacy" board + PollIf you're not really want your thread moved to off topic, I think it's still fit in serious discussion section.
